title: Italian Pasta Sauce - Traditional Pasta Sauce | Prego® Sauces
description: Vine-ripened tomatoes provide the perfect base for a balance of sweet tomato taste and savory Italian seasonings. Try Prego Traditional for an easy dinner in minutes.
